data.name: ForeVR Bowl
data.description:
Whether you are looking for a casual game with friends or rekindling a family rivalry... ForeVR Bowl has you covered! 

Explore 8 immersive lanes (The Moon, TIki Hall, Atlantis, & more!) and unlock 150+ unique bowling balls to find your perfect game. Climb the leaderboard and win weekly events and challenges. Choose from 1000s of songs on the YouTube powered Jukebox. Bowling solo, online multiplayer, or local pass-and-play will never be the same in VR!

Pick a side in 'Versus Mode' each week to win prizes for your team. Strike a pose with friends and document your Bowling Night fun with the brand new Selfie Cam. Search each hall for unlock-able Hidden Balls.

ForeVR Bowl is THE premium Oculus Quest bowling simulator!

"ForeVR Bowl is bowling in VR done right." - The VRGrid

CNET Editor's Pick: "Best VR Bowling" and one of "Best [Meta] Quest 2 Games and Experiences"

toms guide pick "Oculus Quest 2 â€” here's the 7 games you should play first"

SUPPORT
â“ Found a bug, or experiencing an issue? Reach out to our team at help.forevrgames.com!

Happy spooky szn, bowlers! ğŸƒ ForeVR Bowl 1.14 brings a ton of changes, including:

ğŸ³ Upgraded throw
ğŸ³ Pro Shop tutorial for new users
ğŸ³ Main Menu tutorial for new users
ğŸ³ 5 Spooky bowling balls with blacklight effects
ğŸ³ Blacklight Boo-wling: Spooky ghostly NPCs ğŸ‘» and frightful decor ğŸƒ in the Blacklight Hall

SUPPORT
ğŸ³ Need support, or found a bug? Reach out at help.forevrgames.com!

IMPROVEMENTS
ğŸ³ Various bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
ğŸ³ Sometimes when accepting an invite while the results screen is showing in a hall, it will cause players to be able to play in different halls. If this is encountered, please leave and then rejoin the party, and the issue should be fixed. 
ğŸ³ Very rarely, the game may crash when repeatedly joining and leaving the same party. 
ğŸ³ Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
ğŸ³ Various bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
ğŸ³ Sometimes when accepting an invite while the results screen is showing in a hall, it will cause players to be able to play in different halls. If this is encountered, please leave and then rejoin the party, and the issue should be fixed. 
ğŸ³ Very rarely, the game may crash when repeatedly joining and leaving the same party. 
ğŸ³ Need support? help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS

ğŸ³ Ball Pro Shop has been reorganized! Balls will now be sorted by the level they unlock at. Blacklight and Hidden balls will still be in their collections. This also includes a refresh of the store backsplashes! 
ğŸ³ When no open games are found when selecting â€œQuick Matchâ€, a new public multiplayer game will be created for you! 
ğŸ³ Multiplayer stability improvements! 
ğŸ³ Fixed! Resolved an issue where playersâ€™ Oculus avatars were invisible in multiplayer matches.
ğŸ³ Fixed! Resolved an issue where players were able to enter two different halls even though they were in the same party.
ğŸ³ Fixed! Resolved an issue where the spare SFX appears when the throw is a foul. 
ğŸ³ Fixed! In some instances, players were unable to see each other when joining a party. 

KNOWN ISSUES
ğŸ³ Sometimes when accepting an invite while the results screen is showing in a hall, it will cause players to be able to play in different halls. If this is encountered, please leave and then rejoin the party, and the issue should be fixed. 
ğŸ³Very rarely, the game may crash when repeatedly joining and leaving the same party. 
ğŸ³ Need support? help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
ğŸ³ Updated to Meta Avatar SDK 12. 
ğŸ³ Increased NPC animation framerate on both Quest 1 and Quest 2 headsets.
ğŸ³ Improved NPC performance on Quest 1 headsets.
ğŸ³ Fixed issue causing NPCs to flicker.
ğŸ³ Fixed issue when entering an invalid Room Code did not display an error message.
ğŸ³ Fixed issue where the Room Code number pad blocks the Main Menu for seated players.
ğŸ³ Fixed issue when collecting Disco Diva and High Desert hidden balls did not count towards total owned balls.

KNOWN ISSUES
ğŸ³ Nameplate disconnects from player avatar when moving around the Guardian boundary.
ğŸ³ Need support? http://help.forevrgames.com

WHATâ€™S NEW
Itâ€™s ForeVR Bowlâ€™s 1st Birthday! Join in the fun with the Bowliversary birthday bash, happening now until June 26th. Earn 4x XP and 10x Coins in all Multiplayer games, and purchase the exclusive 1st Bowliversary ball in the Pro Shop for just 1 Coin! Keep an eye out for our Oculus developer post for more information, or hop in now to check out the party! 
Thanks for an amazing first year, bowlers! 

IMPROVEMENTS
ğŸ³ Improved bowling ball sound effect when rolling and hitting pins
ğŸ³ Tuned ambient noise issue in the halls
ğŸ³ Improved pointer beam usability and visibility
ğŸ³ Foot pads now appear on thumbstick tilt
ğŸ³ Lifetime best score added to statistics wall
ğŸ³ Fixed issue where bowling ball appeared detached from the playerâ€™s hand while held
ğŸ³ Fixed issue where camera did not come back after being inactive for 30 seconds
ğŸ³ Fixed issue where players werenâ€™t able to level up multiple times in a single game
ğŸ³ Reduced level requirements for early level bowling balls
ğŸ³ Hand effects now appear consistent size. (For more information access the help center from the jukebox)
ğŸ³ Oil patterns are now visible by default
ğŸ³ Removed invisible wall in the ForeVR 90s Hall
ğŸ³ Bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
ğŸ³ Need support? help.forevrgames.com

WHATâ€™S NEW
ğŸ³ ForeVR 90s invites you to roll in brand new Blacklight Bowling modeâ€¦ itâ€™s lit!
ğŸ³ 5 unique Bowling Balls with special Blacklight mode effect
ğŸ³ New Optimized throw type: This throw adds additional points of optimization to our current throw. Players can select between Classic (launch throw), Default (aka â€œThrow 2.0â€), and Optimized for whatever feels best!
ğŸ³ Updated starting arsenal for new players featuring player favorites: Rolling Gold, Beginner Blast, and Earth
ğŸ³ Earth bowling ball now unlocks at Level 1
ğŸ³ 5 New Super Bowling sports balls!
ğŸ³ Deck the Hall Holiday Hall melted
ğŸ³ Holiday Hall balls unwrapped and available in the store
ğŸ³ Updated Media Player: Our Jukebox now features the playlists you love PLUS help articles and creator content
ğŸ³ Multiplayer Quick Match button. Join an open multiplayer lobby in one click

IMPROVEMENTS
ğŸ³ Frame Reset button resets the pins, player turn, and ball return in multiplayer games. Pro Tip: this is a great way to troubleshoot connections, if your party gets out of sync try Frame Reset!
ğŸ³ Snap to in-game Foot pads to quickly navigate around the lobby and hall when using teleport
ğŸ³ Localization updates
ğŸ Bug fixes

ğŸ³Need support? help.forevrgames.com
